pli-tv-pvr1.11:1.1: Because of indulging in sexual intercourse, of the four fallings away how many fallings do the offences appertain to?
pli-tv-pvr1.11:1.2: Because of … appertain to two fallings away …
pli-tv-pvr1.11:1.3: there may be falling away from moral habit; there may be falling away from good behavior …
pli-tv-pvr1.11:2.1: Because of, out of disrespect … spitting in water, of the four fallings away how many fallings away does the offence appertain to?
pli-tv-pvr1.11:3.1: Concluded is the Third Chapter: that on Falling Away
